Package edu.wit.scds.comp2000.queue.app

Class Station

java.lang.Object
edu.wit.scds.comp2000.queue.app.Station
public final class Station
extends java.lang.Object
Representation of a station on a train route. A Station has two platforms (queues) where Passengers wait before boarding a train. Passengers wait on the platform which serves trains traveling in the direction that can take them to their destination in the least time.

NOTE: This class is incomplete - you may want to restructure it based on your implementation's requirements.

NOTE: You must retain all authorship comments. You should add/update your authorship and modification history tags after the existing tags.

Version:
0.1.0 base version, 1.0.0 initial implementation, 2.0.0 2021-10-30
  • restructure to use simulation callback instead of parameter passing
  • major restructuring
  • clean up
, 2.1.0 2021-11-01 finish implementation
Author:
Dave Rosenberg, Your Name

    • hasWaitingPassenger

      public boolean hasWaitingPassenger​(Direction goingInDirection)
      Indicate whether there are any passengers waiting to go in the specified direction
      Parameters:
      goingInDirection - the direction the train is traveling
      Returns:
      true if the platform exists and has at least one passenger on it and false otherwise

    • getWaitingPassenger

      public Passenger getWaitingPassenger​(Direction goingInDirection)
      Returns the next passenger waiting to go in the specified direction
      Parameters:
      goingInDirection - the direction the train is traveling
      Returns:
      the first passenger on the specified platform or null if the platform doesn't exist or there are no passengers waiting on it

    • enter

      public void enter​(Passenger aPassenger)
      Guide a passenger entering this station to the appropriate platform
      Parameters:
      aPassenger - a passenger traveling from here to elsewhere

    • setSimulationCallback

      static void setSimulationCallback​(TrainSimulation currentSimulation)
      Enable callback to the simulation to access:
      • configuration
      • current time
      • random number generator instance
      • logger
      • train route

      This setup is done once at the start of the simulation for this entire class

      Parameters:
      currentSimulation - instance providing callback functionality

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Test driver
      Parameters:
      args - -unused-
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the configuration file doesn't exist or can't be opened for read access
